Welcome to Your Justia Insights Newsletter 

Stay informed with the newsletter designed to bring updates and insights from our team directly to the Justia Connect community.

Explore the risks of improper website maintenance, check out our tips for choosing a domain name for your law firm website, and learn more about the people helping to refine the Google algorithm. Get updates on some of the latest breaking news in the law in technology, including the Elon Musk/Twitter trial, and see what our team has been up to behind the scenes at Justia!

Featured News

3 Big Risks of Improper Law Firm Website Maintenance

Website maintenance helps ensure your law firm website continues connecting your practice with new clients. Just as neglecting proper maintenance on a home or a car carries risks, there are risks associated with improper maintenance of your law firm website. Check out this post to learn more.

The Law & Justice in Art

Need a moment to unwind before the long weekend but want to stay semi-focused on work? Check out a few famous depictions of the law and justice in art.

Google Sunsetting Expanded Text Ads: What This Means for Lawyers

Expanded Text Ads are Google Search ads that replaced the shorter standard Google text ad several years ago. However, Google is sunsetting Expanded Text Ads this week! Check out this post to learn more about what this means for lawyers and how your firm should respond moving forward.

Featured Justia Resources: Civil Rights and Discrimination Center

Did you know that Justia offers numerous free resources to make the law more accessible and help people better understand the foundations of a variety of legal areas? In this post, you can learn more about the information available in Justia’s Civil Rights and Discrimination Center.

Social Media, Media Interactions, and Legal Ethics

Embracing the modern media landscape often presents ethical concerns for practicing attorneys. In this post, we explore some of the guidance on social media and media interactions offered by the ABA Model Rules of Professional Conduct and offer a few suggestions for avoiding related ethical pitfalls.

People Powering the Google Algorithm

When people refer to the “Google algorithm”, they are often referring to a complex system of multiple algorithms used to determine the information displayed on search result pages. However, algorithms still require a human touch to function properly. Check out this article to learn more.
